forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 67. Southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 89. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
As the tranquil veil of night begins to lift over Boston, the air remains pleasantly warm, holding a promise of bright sunshine as the day unfolds. With a low temperature resting comfortably at 67 degrees, a gentle southwest breeze caresses the skin, whispering of a day that will soon embrace the warmth of summer. As dawn approaches, the clear sky hints at the vibrancy that awaits, with no fog lingering to obscure the view—a perfect canvas for the oncoming sun.

Come Thursday, expect the golden orb to grace the heavens once more, pushing temperatures toward a balmy high near 89. With the southwest winds dancing through the streets at a moderate clip, there will be a refreshing quality to the warmth. For those venturing out, light fabrics will serve well, perhaps a breezy shirt paired with comfortable shorts; breathable footwear will keep your spirit as light as the anticipated clouds. The clear skies may invite a stroll through Boston Common or a leisurely read at a nearby café, where you might find a quiet corner to appreciate both the day and the slow passage of time. Engage with this splendid weather by taking a casual walk along the Charles River, or simply pause to enjoy the sights of this beautiful city. The pleasures of this day are found in simplicity, and the allure of a summer day is a call to quiet enjoyment.
